name: credit-nocredit-rules
description: Clarifies which CSC electives allow Credit/No Credit grading.

events.content: Can we take CSC electives CR/NC? Thinking of lightening the load.
Only special topics (29x) and internships allow CR/NC. Core tech electives must stay letter graded.
Also remember: maximum 16 units of CR/NC apply to your degree, and none can cover GE Area A-D.
Makes sense. Guess I'm keeping CSC 430 letter graded.
